They note correctly how both look but specify A will also have classes for an engineering candidate. Based on this, it is suggestive this specific mention leans a bit towards Preference A.

The comment might appear balanced when investigating both campuses impartially, but given that a potential studying future is hidden within the context and that A contains more opportunities and more things to do, it leaves an indication A is the chosen one for the commenter out of the two institutions.

###
